snippet: Kreider scored 38 seconds into the Rangers’ 3-2 win and dropped hard hits on Alexander Ovechkin and Brooks Orpik.
abstract: New York Rangers forward Chris Kreider makes big impact in second game of playoff series against Washington Capitals, scoring 38 seconds into Rangers 3-2 victory and delivering several hard hits.
lead_paragraph: Kreider scored 38 seconds into the Rangers’ 3-2 win and dropped hard hits on Alexander Ovechkin and Brooks Orpik.

headline.main: Chris Kreider Makes His Presence Felt
